name: solid-ts-windi-ssr-template
description: Simple Solid template supporting TypeScript, WindiCSS powered by Vite with SSR plugin.

scripts.prod: npm run build && npm run server:prod
scripts.prod:ssg: npm run build:ssg && npm run server:prod
scripts.build:ssg: vite build && vite build --ssr && vite-plugin-ssr prerender
